subject: Refund on power supply (SSN3916)
description_text:
Hello, I am Matthew Yang who just purchased my pedals with haptic motors.
As I didnâ€™t know that I need to purchase the power supply separately, and I
later noticed, so I put in an order for the power supply separately. Now
that I received an email that I could have just clicked the link to add the
power supply, which I did, I would like to cancel my order on the power
supply which is order number
SSN3916.
Can you please cancel the order and issue me a refund? Thank you.

Sincerely, Matthew Yang

conversations.body_text: Hi Matthew Yang,    Alright, we'll cancel it for you and issue a refund.
